alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Floyd; Howard; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 3:39AM CST until January 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Slick to Hazardous Travel With Freezing Rain and a Wintry Mix... .A messy wintry mix of sleet, snow and freezing rain has resulted in slick road conditions early this morning. Spin-offs have been reported. Slowly warming temperatures are expected into the morning hours with a gradual transition to rain from the south, although cooler ridgetops and sheltered areas may remain icy and slippery well into the daytime. Freezing rain or a wintry mix will persist into the afternoon, especially for areas near and north of Interstate 90. If traveling, slow down and use extra caution. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of up to 1/10 of an inch. * WHERE...Mitchell, Howard, Floyd and Chickasaw Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery to hazardous road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511ia.org for road conditions.
